mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ORDER_TBL(ord_code, dark_id, ord_name, ord_zipcode, ord_addr_basic, ord_addr_detail, ord_tel, ord_price, ord_regdate, ord_status, payment_status) VALUES(#{ord_code}, #{dark_id}, #{ord_name}, #{ord_zipcode}, #{ord_addr_basic}, #{ord_addr_detail}, #{ord_tel}, #{ord_price}, sysdate, #{ord_status}, #{payment_status})

INSERT INTO ORDETAIL_TBL(ord_code, item_num, dt_amount, dt_price) SELECT #{ord_code}, c.item_num, c.cart_amount, i.item_price FROM CART_TBL c inner join ITEM_TBL i on c.item_num = i.item_num WHERE DARK_ID = #{dark_id}
